no_statistic.message:
Is currently very little statistical data.
Try to access the plugin later.

option_label_reset.message: ATTENTION! is to remove all of your statistics and settings

alert_error_pattern_name.message: Name of pattern can't be empty!

alert_error_pattern.message: With help of what pattern are you going to check up?!

alert_pattern_test.message: Let's check up your pattern! Copy URL, that will match with pattern

alert_pattern_test_error.message: Impossible to match. Try to make your pattern in another way

alert_pattern_test_error2.message: Impossible to detect the substring. You forgot to put in "mass storage brackets" in pattern, didn't you? It's impossible to work without them.

alert_remove_pattern.message: Are you sure, that you want to delete?

alert_add_ThreeLVLDomain.message: Enter the domain for which statistics will be collected based on three levels. Example: "google.com"

alert_reset.message: For hard reset enter "reset" in input field and press OK
